GSD.product_version: versions from v4.5 to before v6.0.13
GSD.description:
net: mvneta: Prevent out of bounds read in mvneta_config_rss()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.13 by commit 6ca0a506dddc3e1d636935eef339576b263bf3d8, it was introduced in version v4.5 by commit cad5d847a093077b499a8b0bbfe6804b9226c03e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: mvneta: Prevent out of bounds read in mvneta_config_rss()
